officeHoursWarning() - Static method in class Utils.AlertUtil
Displays when the user selects a date for Appointment creation or modification that is outside office hours

Called after the user clicks the "Add" button underneath the Appointments table.
onAddCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainViewController
This function is called after the user clicks the "Add" button underneath the Customers table and open a view where the user can add all necessary information to create their new Customer to add to the database.

onCustomerReportsButtonClicked(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainViewController
When the customer reports button is clicked a new view will appear that allows the user to select a customer and see in a text format a report that shows all the appointments in the database for that customer.

Called when the user selects a Customer from the ComboBox.
